text:
I know this is mainly for dev bugs in the code.  But I thought that this was 
important enough that I should report it.  Everytime I try to download the 
Xerces and Xalan parsers. doesn't matter what version, The Zip file contains 
files that have nothing in them.  I don't know whats causing the problem but I 
can't get the jar files that I need to do some XML dev with the parsers.

Brad
creator: eclectic2_2000@hotmail.com
